name: Gobro
description:
-Story-

On a planet far from our earth, there is a half bronze half gold world. Gold creatures live in the Golden zone, bronze creatures live in the Bronze zone. Gold is very rich, bronze is very poor. bronzes one day asks our golden friend the source of this wealth. but our friend does not say. Then our bronze friend is kidnapped and imprisoned.

Our mission is to save our friend.

so can you do this ??

-Team-

The game is made by one person.

Game Developer : Tarık HURMA (TASO)

İnstagram : https://www.instagram.com/tariksoftware/ 

https://tasoportfolyo.blogspot.com/

https://tasosowo.blogspot.com/

https://tasoartworld.blogspot.com/

-Controls-

Move with "A" and "D". jump with "W"

-Assets Used-

8Bit Music Album - 051321
